scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev
scripts.bump:dev: if [ `cat package.json | jq -r '.devDependencies | length'` -ne 0 ]; then npm install $BUMP_DEV_OPTIONS $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $p | ((.devDependencies // {}) | keys) | map(. + "@" + ($p[.] // ["latest"])[0]) | .[]'); fi
scripts.bump:prod: if [ `cat package.json | jq -r '.dependencies | length'` -ne 0 ]; then npm install $BUMP_PROD_OPTIONS $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $p | ((.dependencies // {}) | keys) | map(. + "@" + ($p[.] // ["latest"])[0]) | .[]'); fi
scripts.precommit: npm run precommit:eslint && npm run precommit:typescript
scripts.scaffold: npm install --save @npm-workspace/offline-chat-adapter@0.0.0-0 botframework-webchat@latest react-dom@latest react@latest && npm install --save-dev @types/math-random@latest @types/react@latest @types/react-dom@latest eslint-plugin-react@latest esbuild@latest
